name: mediadownloader-clone
description: A simple, fast, and reliable media downloader for social media platforms

scripts.build:prod: cd client && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: cd client && rm -rf build node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.analyze: cd client && npm run build && npx source-map-explorer 'build/static/js/*.js'
